701107f-a.title: Bronx: Gerard Avenue - 167th Street (East)
701107f-a.text:
Gerard Ave., west side, south from East 168th Street to East 167th
Street. On the extreme riccht is visible the elevated trestle of the
I.R.T. Jerome Ave. subway line,running at this point, on River Ave.
About 1917.
Joseph P. Day.
CREDIT LINE IMPERATIVE ON ALL REPRODUCTIONS.
